title: Science Education Design Utilizing Digital Storytelling and Emotion-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening science curriculum-linked emotion-based learning design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Design three or more educational scenarios combining science concepts and emotions using digital storytelling tools.
Develop and implement one science project applying emotion-based learning theory.
Revise and improve digital storytelling learning materials at least twice based on peer feedback.

resources: Digital Storytelling Authoring Software (e.g., Adobe Spark, Canva)
Access to Science Education Content Database
Sentiment Analysis Tools (e.g., IBM Watson Tone Analyzer)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
